department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

remark.ch: 與AG7077地質力學專題討論II合班上課

goal.en: To train graduate students how to do oral presentation and let them improve their English comprehension and enhance their professional knowlege via reading papers recently published in periodicals.
goal.ch: 訓練研究生上台報告的技巧及臺風，並透過期刊文章的閱讀增進英文及專業知識。

content.en: Studying papers oriented in geomechanical field.
content.ch: 以涉獵地質力學方面的文章為主要訴求。

grading.en: 1. Slide design (30％) 2. Report content (40％) 3. Repesetation skills and interaction with others (30％)
grading.ch: 1.投影片的設計 (30％) 2.報告內容 (40％) 3.臺風及問題回答表現(30％)

office_hr.en: Anytime but making an appointment in advance
office_hr.ch: Anytime but making an appointment in advance
